thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 23 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Jiangsu Yuyue Medical Equipment Signs Letter Of Intent To Buy Stake In Pharma Technology Firm

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Jiangsu Yuyue Medical Equipment Signs Letter Of Intent To Buy Stake In Pharma Technology Firm

organizations.name: jiangsu yuyue medical equipment & supply co ltd

text:
Jan 23 (Reuters) - Jiangsu Yuyue Medical Equipment & Supply Co Ltd:
* SAYS IT SIGNS LETTER OF INTENT TO BUY 38.4 PERCENT STAKE IN PHARMA TECHNOLOGY RELATED FIRM FOR UP TO 550 MILLION YUAN ($85.95 million) Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/2rusd9f Further company coverage: ($1 = 6.3990 Chinese yuan renminbi) (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom)
